name: Bundesverband Agrarhandel e.V.
goal:
The Federal Association of Agricultural Traders
(BVA) represents the interests of agricultural traders in Germany. BVA member companies collect and store agricultural raw materials, such as cereals and oilseeds. They treat these products by drying and cleaning and market them as food and feed to processors and exporters. In addition, BVA member companies sell seeds, crop protection products and fertilizers as well as feed to farmers.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- regulation concerning the placing of plant protection products on the market
- regulation on EU fertilising products
- regulation on official controls
